SeismicPickingTypeID.description: Method used to pick faults. E.g.Autotracked, Grid, Manual Picked, Mixed.

Remark.description: Optional comment to capture interpreter thoughts.  Distinguished from Description which is a general explanation of the object.

SeismicDomainTypeID.description: Vertical domain of faults.  E.g. Time, Depth

SeismicDomainUOM.description: Unit of measurement for vertical domain

HorizontalCRSID.description: The CRS for surface coordinates used in fault locations if not specified in File.

BinGridID.description: the Bin Grid of the Fault System when coordinates are specified in seismic bin inline/crossline.

VerticalDatumOffset.description: Datum value, the elevation of zero time/depth on the vertical axis in the domain of seismicdomaintype relative to the vertical reference datum used (usually MSL). Positive is upward from zero elevation to seismic datum).

VerticalMeasurementTypeID.description: Identifies a vertical reference datum type. E.g. mean sea level, ground level, mudline.

ReplacementVelocity.description: Value used to produce vertical static shifts in data

Faults.description: Array of Faults that comprise the Fault System

SeismicFaultName.description: Name of an individual fault within a fault system.

SeismicFaultTypeID.description: Geological type of fault geometry. E.g. Thrust (thr), Reverse (rev), Normal(norm)

SeismicPickingTypeID.description: Method used to pick faults. E.g.Autotracked, Grid, Manual Picked

SeismicFaultLength.description: Maximum linear dimension measured along strike of the slip surface

SeismicFaultLengthUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the Length of the Fault

SeismicFaultSurfaceArea.description: Surface Area of the Fault Plane

SeismicFaultSurfaceAreaUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the Surface Area of the Fault

VerticalFaultDipAngleUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the Dip angle of the Fault

FaultHeaveNumber.description: Maximum stratigraphic heave, the apparent horizontal component of the net-slip.

FaultHeaveNumberUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the FaultHeaveNumber

FaultNetSlipNumberUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the FaultNetSlipNumber

StratigraphicFaultOffset.description: Maximum vertical offset of faulted strata.

StratigraphicFaultOffsetUOM.description: ID of the Unit of Measure of the StratigraphicFaultOffset

Interpreter.description: The person or team who interpreted the fault data.
